Text:
If you don't need the maps for Australia and New Zealand, don't download the two files named "Australia.map" and "New Zealand.map" in the directory "Navigon\map\".
It will save you 180MB of download.  You can still use the app and download maps of other countries from there.
Works fine on a Samsung Galaxy Note, thank you. But how do you get the different voices to work?
Downloaded and installed on HTC Incredible S. Works perfectly. Thanks uploader... shall seed!
